content: are formed stitching into the five corner stitches with yarn a starting in a round 13 double_crochet 2 st before a corner puff form an mccl slip_stitch in each of next 25 round 14 slip_stitch mccl over next 5 round 13 sts x 3 slip_stitch in next 25 round 14 sl sts slip_stitch to starting slip_stitch to join finish off 100 slip_stitch 4 mccls round 16 replace yarn b on hook working into round 13 stitches in front of round 14 and 15 chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet in each of next 5 st half_double_crochet in each of next 5 st double_crochet in each of next 2 st working behind mccl 4 double_crochet in round 14 chain-3 chain 2 4 double_crochet in next round 14 chain-3 working into round 13 stitches in front of round 14 and 15 double_crochet in each of next 2 st half_double_crochet in each of next 5 st single_crochet in each of next 11 st half_double_crochet in each of next 5 st double_crochet in each of next 2 st working behind mccl 4 double_crochet in round 14 chain-3 chain 2 4 double_crochet in next round 14 chain-3 x 3 working into round 13 stitches in front of round 14 and 15 double_crochet in each of next 2 st half_double_crochet in each of next 5 st single_crochet in each of next 5 st slip_stitch to starting single_crochet to join 44 single_crochet 40 half_double_crochet 48 double_crochet 4 chain-2 round 17 chain 1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet in each of next 11 st half_double_crochet in each of next 2 st double_crochet in each of next 2 st treble_crochet in next st 2 treble_crochet chain 2 trt treble_crochet in corner chain treble_crochet in next st double_crochet in each of next 2 st half_double_crochet in each of next 2 st single_crochet in each of next 23 st half_double_crochet in each of next 2 st double_crochet in each of next 2 st treble_crochet in next st 2 treble_crochet chain 2 trt treble_crochet in corner chain x 3 treble_crochet in next st double_crochet in each of next 2 st half_double_crochet in each of next 2 st single_crochet in each of next 11 st slip_stitch to starting single_crochet to join finish off 92 single_crochet 16 half_double_crochet 16 double_crochet 24 treble_crochet 4 chain-2 round 18 join yarn a with a slip_stitch in any treble_crochet before a corner chain 2 half_double_crochet chain 2 half_double_crochet in corner chain-2 half_double_crochet in each of next 37 st half_double_crochet chain 2 half_double_crochet in corner chain-2 x 3 half_double_crochet in each of next 36 st slip_stitch to 2nd st of starting chain to join finish off 39 half_double_crochet per side 4 chain-2 sew in any stray ends block if you wish sit back and be glad these fungi did not appear in your lawn thanks to eagle eyed testers berniece c j jilly joanna joyce and lynne they make all the difference © 2018 lettice rose away with the fairies afghan square page 4 of 4
